conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 6-1;Non-pecuniary damage - award
judges: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
scl: B. and P. v. the United Kingdom, nos. 36337/97 and 35974/97, ECHR 2001-III;Campbell and Fell v. the United Kingdom, 28 June 1984, Series A no. 80;Gautrin and Others v. France, 20 May 1998, Reports of Judgments and Decisions 1998-III;Pretto and Others v. Italy, 8 December 1983, Series A no. 71, § 21;Riepan v. Austria, no. 35115/97, ECHR 2000-XII;Volkov v. Russia, no. 64056/00, 4 December 2007
